channel.title: Blogging
channel.description:
Kinda weird question.
Is there any type of package like SMF or something like forums that is blogging instead?
Instead of setting up a blogging site on a... blogging site. Have your own site, install the blog, and use it just like the site?

item.title: Blogging
item.dc:creator: @Exception1 Exception_
item.description:
@Exception1 wrote:

I could give you free hosting (PHP, mysql and the rest…) but it wouldn’t be as fast as commercial hosting, especially if publishing loads of videos/images etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Blogging
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Awh dude thank you a lot.

I’m probably setting up something more than just a blog.

I was planning on getting a domain and using a cheap or free webhost to store my stuff. If I can get a good enough one I’ll post all my VFX work etc in high quality on that instead of using video sites.

And then using something like blog.somethingtohide.com for the blog part. It’d be mostly based around the blog part. A space for me to ramble and post updates on everything I’m doing etc.

Know of any good free or really cheap hosting sites? All I’d require is the ability to install that WordPress, decent space (used to have one with 500mb, might need more this time if I plan on posting videos and stuff), and I can’t think of much else.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2009, 10:12:27 pm[/size][hr]

Preferably free actually. I can just get a domain name and use that on a free site. I’d like to start out on a free one to see if I’ll keep it up or if I’d really need the extras, and if I change my mind I’d pay.

Read full topic
